resources.string: I have 2 feet, 6 legs, eight arms, two heads and one eye, who am I?
I have something in my pocket but my pocket is empty, What is it?
There is me 2 times a year, 1 time in the week, but not in the day ... Who am I?
Better than God, worse than the devil, The poor have it, the rich need it, And if you eat, you die.
How can you put drops of water in an empty glass?
How many square theres there in a 4x4 grid?
Your doctor gave you a treatment of three capsules. we must take one every half hour. What is the treatment duration (in minutes)?
father was 30 years older than his son. Father and son together have 36an. What is the age of the father?
Abdou 10 years, his brother Akram half his age. When Abdou will be 10 times older, how old will Akram?
During a chess competition, 10 players made one party against the others. How many games have been played?
